mapper.sql: id, uid, code, db_code, name, comment, create_user, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, update_user, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into dm_table
uid, `code`, db_code, `name`,
comment,
create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time,
#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
mapper.update:
update dm_table
db_code = #{dbCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where `code` = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
